BlueCat Nova Monitor
===============================

version number: 0.0.1
author: Brian Shorland

Overview
--------

BlueCat Nova Monitor

Installation / Usage
--------------------

To install use pip:

    $ pip install bluecatnovamonitor


Or clone the repo:

    $ git clone https://github.com/bshorland/bluecatnovamonitor.git
    $ python setup.py install
